description:
Salomon's Shift Pro 130 AT combines the stability and power of a true alpine boot with the versatility of a touring boot fit for the whole mountain. The highly customizable Custom Shell HD and liner can be thermo-moulded to fit your foot perfectly. The GripWalk soles and Surelock mechanism provide traction and range of motion when in walk mode. Inbounds or out of bounds, the shift has never been easier.

  • Polyamide shell with XeCarb® 10 carbon fibre framing transfers power efficiently to your ski
  • Cuff is Polyolefin and polyamide for stability and ideal flex
  • Custom Shell HD and seamless liner can be thermo-moulded for personalized performance
  • 4 aluminum micro-adjust buckles secure your foot in a snug fit
  • 45 mm strap offer two positions for a customized fit
  • Sensifit™ inserts for easy step-in
  • Adjustable flex lets you tweak the boot's stiffness
  • Oversized pivot transfers power smoothly
  • Grip Walk soles allow a natural stride with a rockered design
  • Contagrip® rubber between heel and toe for grip in rocky terrain
  • Compatible with tech bindings, WTR bindings, GripWalk bindings and MNC bindings
name: Salomon Shift Pro 130 AT Ski Boots - Unisex
